content.description:
PROJECTED SPENDING FOR MAJOR BUDGET CATEGORIES

(Percentage of gross domestic product)

Source: Office of Management and Budget, 2014

Note: "All Other Programs" consist of all mandatory programs other than Social Security and the major health care programs, as well as defense and nondefense discretionary programs.
content.question: Social Security will account for how about much of projected spending in 2024, according to the line graph?
